title: Roast grouse with pâté and bread sauce
ingredients: 4 slices smoked streaky bacon, cut in half lengthways
4 grouse, cleaned, wishbones removed, 75g/3oz of the livers and hearts reserved (see below)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
500ml/18fl oz hot game or beef stock
75g/3oz reserved grouse liver and heart (see above)
4 slices white bread, cut into heart shapes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
